column3: Any reason not to do this for the other bitcoin binaries?\n
Is it `-help` (as in the commit) or `--help` (as in the PR title)? Or both? ;-)\n
@paveljanik seems it is `-help`, but `--help` also works [from the CLI].\n

> Any reason not to do this for the other bitcoin binaries?

Yes, if you do this, please do it everywhere where `-help` is accepted.
tested ACK. Now all `bitcoind`, `bitcoin-cli` and `bitcoin-tx` accept `-h` as an argument.\n
